title: Waayaha Cusub
text:
Waayaha Cusub ("The New Era") is a <a href="Somali%20people">Somali</a> musical collective. It is led by singer Falis Abdi. In 2013, the ensemble organized the Reconciliation Music Festival in <a href="Mogadishu">Mogadishu</a>, the first international music festival to be held in <a href="Somalia">Somalia</a>'s capital since the start of the <a href="Somali%20Civil%20War">civil war</a> in the early 1990s.
In October 2014, Abdi and her band applied for asylum in the <a href="Netherlands">Netherlands</a>, where they had been performing a show in <a href="Amsterdam">Amsterdam</a>, after officials in <a href="Kenya">Kenya</a> revoked their immigration cards.
Abdi was born in 1989
